summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5599 for the improvement of Wallingford Avenue, from North 80th Street to North 85th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73719 as amended by Ordinance No. 73792, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
